[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ min_height=”150px” custom_padding=”4px||3px|||”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_font=”||||||||” width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||” custom_padding=”0px||”]

Career Development Services office at IIT Gandhinagar is committed to empower the students to discover their true potential and help them to pursue their dreams in all possible immediate career verticals including Entrepreneurship, Placement, Higher Study and Competitive Examinations. Students can avail CDS resources that can help them to explore and plan their career effectively. Office also conducts various sessions that help students in career counselling, resume preparation, screening tests, group discussion, interview process, personality development among others.
